name: VitalValues
0:
”Alexa, ask Vital Values what are the normal values for a 6 year old child?”
”Alexa, ask Vital Values to get the expected range for a 3 month old”
”Alexa, ask Vital Values what is the range for a child of 5?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vital values
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Vital Values is a simple, quick reference to the normal physiological range of heart rate, respiratory rate and blood pressure in children of all ages. This Alexa skill can provide a hands-free voice-based lookup of these ranges in environments where the use of physical interactive devices such as tablets and smartphones are inappropriate for sanitary reasons.

Disclaimer: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial 911.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
